product_name: Canari Eclipse II Bike Jacket - Men's
long_description: A cycling jacket that converts to a vest in a flash, the men's Canari Eclipse II bike jacket keeps you comfortable with its smooth, wind- and water-resistant fabric when riding in crummy weather. Tightly woven polyester micro fabric is highly wind resistant, water repellent and supple, creating a quiet and comfortable shell. Zip-off sleeves to transform the jacket into a vest when the temperature rises. Two-way full front zipper with draft flap blocks out the elements and provides a means for quick ventilation. Two side-zipper handwarmer/storage pockets; 9 in. back pocket converts to stuff sack with waistbelt attachment for easy transport. Droptail rear hem hugs bottom to ensure protection in the riding position; drawstring bottom hem cinches tight for secure and complete coverage. The men's Canari Eclipse II cycling jacket features reflective detailing on front and back of shoulders to increase visibility.
